7794.quoteText:
We may transfer the personal information we collect about you to the United States and/or another country, which may not be deemed to have the same data protection laws as the country in which you initially provided the information.
When your personal information is in such countries, it may be accessed by the courts, law enforcement and national security authorities in accordance with applicable law.
